highlights.headline: Stars run riot in 3rd period to win Game 1
highlights.description: Trailing 3-1 heading into the third period, the Dallas Stars unleash a barrage of goals to secure a 6-3 win in Game 1 vs. the Edmonton Oilers.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Stars run riot in 3rd period to win Game 1) 2025/05/22 ESHEET SOTFULL

video.headline: Stars run riot in 3rd period to win Game 1

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Stars run riot in 3rd period to win Game 1) 2025/05/22 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — The Dallas Stars powered their way to a series-opening victory in their Western Conference final rematch with the Edmonton Oilers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stars score 3 PP goals in 5 1/2 minutes early in 3rd, rally to beat Oilers 6-3 in Game 1
